panels.description: Current epoch ID for the validator

panels.title: Epoch Duration

panels.description: Number of transactions in the epoch

panels.description: Total amount of gas rewards in the epoch (in SUI tokens)
panels.title: Epoch Gas Rewards (SUI)

panels.description: Total time duration when the validator was halted (i.e. epoch closed)

panels.description: Displays If network is running in safe mode or not.
panels.title: Safe Mode

panels.description: Node stake share
panels.title: Voting Power

panels.description: Shows the current operational status of the SUI Bridge Node (UP/DOWN).
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Displays the uptime trend status of the SUI Validator. Green indicates uptime is increasing, and red indicates it is not.
panels.title: Uptime Timeline

panels.description: Shows validator rank with color indicating reputation status. Green = good standing, Red = low-scoring authority.
panels.title: Reputation Rank

panels.description: Shows validator reputation status over time. Green indicates good standing, red indicates low-scoring status.
panels.title: Reputation Rank Timeline

panels.description: Displays the reputation score of the validator.
panels.title: Consensus Reputation Score

panels.description: Displays Cpnsensus repuattion Score Of validator
panels.title: Reputation Score Over Time

panels.description: Validator rank over time based on consensus reputation score.
panels.title: Reputation Rank Over Time

panels.description: The current threshold clock round. We only advance to a new round when a quorum of parents have been synced.

panels.description:
Condensed "Node Performance" widget for small screens.

 Consensus Network Connectivity

 Cert Processing Latency: p95 shared objects 

 p50 Process Certificate (Internal Processing Only)

 Average Time To Generate Consensus Proposal Latency

 Consensus Proposal Rate

 Leader Round Rate

 MYSTICETI
panels.title: Cert Latency p95     Process Certificate p50     Proposal Latency     Proposal Rate     Leader Round Rate   ( MYSTICETI)

list.description: Your validator name from official dashboard (or prometheus metrics) to filter the data from your validator from others..
list.label: Your validator name

list.description: This variable dynamically fetches and displays all available SUI Validator environments (aliases) from the config.yml file based on the configured validators.
list.label: Validator Target
list.name: instance
